casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Gingerich, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Gingerich (1996), 76 Ohio St.3d 24.]

(No. 95-1570 — Submitted June 5, 1996 — Decided July 3, 1996.) Tim Oliver, Warren County Prosecuting Attorney, and Carolyn A. Duvelius, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Eddie Lawson, for appellant.

*25The judgment of the court of appeals, upholding the constitutionality of R.C. 2925.11(F)(1) and 2925.14(H), is affirmed on the authority of State v. Thompkins (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 558, 664 N.E.2d 926.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
